name: Automatic curtain
description: Example that operates a curtain depending on readings from a light sensor
author: Bufalino Andrea, Carocci Eugenio, Ranalli Alessandro

hwreq: Grove Rotary Angle Sensor connected to the Grove Base Shield Port A0
Grove Light Sensor connected to the Grove Base Shield Port A3
Grove Button connected to the Grove Base Shield Port D4
Stepper Motor Driver Uln200xa connected in this way: I1 -> pin D8; I2 -> pin D9; I3 -> pin D10; I4 -> pin D11; GND -> GND; Vcc -> 5V (Vcc); Vm -> NC (Not Connected)
